column5: Ok Fishin` Fanatics... the deadline for entries into the MUSKIE PAINTING CONTEST is Monday April 30th `07... the winner will be announced on Thursday May 3rd `07....and have his/her name signed on the artwork by wildlife artist Curtis Atwater. If you have not yet entered this FREE CONTEST....now would be a good time to do so. Check it out at http://www.extremeanglertv.com  on the HOME PAGE- click on the Muskie Painting image for info on how to enter.  Good luck to all and thanks again for all who entered.  K-Dawg .... is gone lake trout fishin`!!!
